CustomField.description: May2021: Field can be used either for assistant phone or email. You may add both if 40 characters limit permits it (e.g.: "+33100000000/alex.doe@email.com")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field can be used either for assistant phone or email. You may add both if 40 characters limit permits it (e.g.: "+33100000000/alex.doe@email.com")
